name: nightscout
title: Nightscout
description: View statistics and trends from your Nightscout instance directly in Raycast.
author: zachsea

commands.name: glucoseView
commands.title: View Glucose Readings
commands.subtitle: Nightscout
commands.description: View current glucose readings from your Nightscout instance

commands.name: glucoseUpdate
commands.title: Show Glucose Reading
commands.subtitle: Nightscout
commands.description: Shows the latest glucose reading in root search and optionally in the menu bar

commands.name: eventView
commands.title: Search Entries and Treatments Log
commands.subtitle: Nightscout
commands.description: View all entries and treatments from your Nightscout instance

commands.name: glucoseMenuBar
commands.title: Menu Bar Glucose
commands.subtitle: Nightscout
commands.description: Shows the latest glucose reading in the menu bar

commands.name: treatmentEntry
commands.title: Add Treatment
commands.subtitle: Nightscout
commands.description: Add a new treatment (insulin, carbs, sensor change, etc.) to your Nightscout instance

commands.name: profileView
commands.title: Search Available Profiles
commands.subtitle: Nightscout
commands.description: View all profiles from your Nightscout instance

preferences.name: instance
preferences.title: Nightscout URL
preferences.description: URL of your Nightscout instance (include the protocol e.g. https://)

preferences.name: token
preferences.title: Access Token
preferences.description: If your Nightscout instance requires an access token for read access, enter it here (ensure 'readable' role is assigned). Include 'careportal' role if you want to add treatments.
preferences.placeholder: Access token for your Nightscout instance

preferences.name: graphScale
preferences.title: Graph Scale
preferences.description: Choose between linear or logarithmic scale for the glucose graph

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
